1.desc: Output the screen in H.256(better quality) | 1920x1080 60fps | control | no audio

2.desc: Output the screen in H.254(better compatibility) | 1920x1080 60fps | control | no audio

3.desc: Record the device camera in H.265(Better quality) at 1920x1080 and microphone to Videos/CameraCast.mp4

4.desc: Record the device camera in H.264(Better compatibility) at 1920x1080 and microphone to Videos/CameraCast.mp4

5.desc: Start VLC in a new virtual display (separate from the device display)

6.desc: Control the device without mirroring by simulating a physical keyboard and mouse

7.desc: Control the device using gamepad controllers plugged into the computer

8.desc: Use the front camera as a video source and send the output to a virtual video device

9.desc: Enable TCP/IP mode, allowing for wireless connections. After run this mode you can use another mode

10.desc: Use the device as a keyboard and mouse input
